articles.description: Chelsea kick off their Fifa Club World Cup campaign against Los Angeles FC to tens of thousands of empty seats in Atlanta.

articles.title: Jakob Ingebrigtsen: How relationship with father and coach Gjert led to court

articles.description: Gareth Bale is part of a US-based consortium's attempt to take over League One club Plymouth Argyle with talks in the early stages.

articles.title: Historic three super overs as Netherlands beat Nepal in T20 tri-series

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says he is devastated after running over a groundhog during Sunday's Canadian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton 'devastated' after hitting groundhog at Canadian Grand Prix

articles.description: Harlem Eubank would prefer his cousin, Chris Eubank Jr, to chase a legacy-defining fight against Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez rather than revisit his rivalry with Conor Benn.

articles.description: Salernitana request the second leg of their Serie B relegation play-off against Sampdoria be postponed, after players and staff are admitted to hospital with food poisoning.
articles.title: Salernitana players in hospital with food poisoning before relegation play-off against Sampdoria
